allow: Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "from parts_database import PartsDatabase; db = PartsDatabase(); print(''Manufacturers:'', db.get_all_manufacturers())")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from parts_database import PartsDatabase
db = PartsDatabase()

manufacturers = db.get_all_manufacturers()
print(f''Found {len(manufacturers)} manufacturers'')
for m in manufacturers:
    print(f''  {m[""company_name""]} -> MID: {m[""mid""]}'')

print()
print(''Testing lookups:'')
test_names = [''mmcité'', ''mmcite'', ''MMCITE'', ''MMCITE AS'', ''MMCITE BRAZIL'']
for name in test_names:
    result = db.get_manufacturer_by_name(name)
    print(f''  ""{name}"" -> {result[""mid""] if result else ""NOT FOUND""}'')")

Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
from parts_database import PartsDatabase
db = PartsDatabase()

print(''Testing lookups:'')
test_names = [''mmcité'', ''mmcite'', ''MMCITE AS'', ''mmcité s.r.o.'', ''MMCITE BRAZIL'', ''mmcité do Brasil'', ''OUT SIDER'', ''Out Sider AS'']
for name in test_names:
    result = db.get_manufacturer_by_name(name)
    print(f''  ""{name}"" -> {result[""mid""] if result else ""NOT FOUND""}'')")
